name: container-tab-groups
description: Chrome-like tab groups using private and isolated containers: The ultimate tab manager and groups for Firefox.

scripts.build: node script/clean.js ; eslint . ; webpack ; web-ext build --source-dir ./dist/ --artifacts-dir ./builds/ --overwrite-dest --filename container-tab-groups.prod.xpi
scripts.dev: node script/clean.js ; eslint . ; webpack --mode=development ; web-ext build --source-dir ./dist/ --artifacts-dir ./builds/ --overwrite-dest --filename container-tab-groups.dev.xpi

author: Menhera.org
